attributes.action: Reimburse Lockdown fines for people who had work meeting in their garden.
attributes.additional_details:
Following the government example, all gathering in people gardens were actually work meetings.
And were technically acceptable.
attributes.background: Reimburse Lockdown fines when people were having work meeting in the their garden.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603344
